columbus_engagement.script: Hi {{contact_name}}, I'm Lainie from LNL. We've been tracking the 200% surge in tech-driven commercial interest in the Short North this year. We are currently architecting an 'Institutional Authority' campaign for the district and wanted to feature {{business_name}} as a flagship. We use an n8n + Replicate stack to ensure local brands scale at the same speed as the neighborhood. Are you open to a strategy session at High Street next week?

columbus_engagement.target: German Village Real Estate / Boutique Law
